utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Pheebs, can you help me pick out an engagement ring for Monica? I can’t figure this out! It’s so hard! Should I get her a Tiffany cut or a Princess cut or a—ah-ah! Paper cut!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Now, have you told anyone else?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: No, I don’t want to tell anybody else because I don’t want Monica to find out.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: You told me.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well, it’s because I trust you, you’re one of my best friends, and you walked in on me when I was looking at ring brochures.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah well, once again not knocking pays off. I only wish you hadn’t been on the toilet.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Me too.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey! So Chandler, wanna go to the coffeehouse?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh all right.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah, coffeehouse.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh perfect, we were just gonna see if you wanted to go.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh well, we don’t because we got…the…other pl-place.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: How rude.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh, I’m sorry. You wanna bite?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: So how are things going with Paul?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Good. Although y’know, he-he’s a private guy. Y’know, I wish I could get him to open up a little bit, share some feelings.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: That’s easy! You just have to think of him as a-as a jar of pickles that won’t open.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: So what are you saying; I should run him under hot water and bang his head against a table?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: No that’s what you do when you want to get the truth out of someone.

utterance.speaker: Paul
utterance.content: Hi honey.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hi!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Watch this.

utterance.speaker: Paul
utterance.content: How are you?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hi Paul!

utterance.speaker: Paul
utterance.content: Hi Phoebe.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: So how are things going with you?

utterance.speaker: Paul
utterance.content: Can’t complain.

utterance.speaker: Paul
utterance.content: Come on.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Paul
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hi!

utterance.speaker: Paul
utterance.content: Ross!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Great to see you!

utterance.speaker: Paul
utterance.content: Good to see you too!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: How you doing?

utterance.speaker: Paul
utterance.content: Good. Bye!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay! You take care!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey Pheebs, what-what was the deal with you and Chandler blowing us off before?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah! That was so weird, huh?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Phoebe, why’d you do it?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I didn’t do it! It was Chandler! He’s… He’s mad at you!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What?! Why?!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Please, I think you know why.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I can’t think of anything.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Come on Ross, you’re a paleontologist, dig a little deeper.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Wait a minute, is it because Joey and I didn’t invite him to that Knicks game a couple of weeks ago?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Do you think that’s something that he’d be mad at you for?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I guess it could.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well then I think that’s it.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well, if he’s angry, he really shouldn’t just cover it up. I-I wish he would just tell me the truth.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, if that’s what you want you then you really should run his head under hot water and bang his head against a table.

utterance.speaker: Paul
utterance.content: Honey I made a reservation at China Garden, is that okay?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah that’s great. But first, wait, talk to me, talk to me. Tell me about your day.

utterance.speaker: Paul
utterance.content: It was fine.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay. Hey, what are you thinking? What are you thinking right now?

utterance.speaker: Paul
utterance.content: I’m thinking that you are looking really fine it that dress.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah that’s great Paul, but y’know I wanna know what——Wow, those are really great! I just wanna know what, what is behind this-this strong, silent exterior. Y’know they say that still waters run deep and I wanna swim in yours.

utterance.speaker: Paul
utterance.content: Are you talking about having sex?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No Paul, I don’t know anything about you! Y’know, like-like your childhood! Tell me about your childhood!

utterance.speaker: Paul
utterance.content: Normal.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay, well then how about puberty! Come on, that’s always a painful time! Y’know your friends invite you to a slumber party and then they stick your hand in warm water while you’re sleeping so that you pee in your sleeping bag.

utterance.speaker: Paul
utterance.content: Nope! That never happened to me!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, you’re lucky you never met that bitch Sharon Majesky. Anyway, umm… The rest of you life, y’know? Any regrets?

utterance.speaker: Paul
utterance.content: Nope.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: All right Paul, I’m not asking for a lot here. Okay? Just give me something. Anything!

utterance.speaker: Paul
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Paul
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: All right.

utterance.speaker: Paul
utterance.content: When I was six years old.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hm-mmm.

utterance.speaker: Paul
utterance.content: I wanted a big wheel. And instead my parents got me this little plastic chicken that you hop around on. It was embarrassing; kids made fun of me. That was a pretty tough year.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: That’s-that’s great! See? I already feel like I know you a little better! Thank you. Okay, come on. Now we can go eat. Let’s go.

utterance.speaker: Paul
utterance.content: It was horrible. They called me chicken boy.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh!

utterance.speaker: Paul
utterance.content: And in fifth grade I got into a fight. Well, it wasn’t really a fight. Richard Darinvel bit me on the nose and, and I feel down. I still have a little scare right here you can see it.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah. Yeah, I-I-I see the scare. Listen, Paul, I think this is really great that-that y’know, you shared your feelings. It’s really, it’s beautiful, but umm, what do you say we go share some food?

utterance.speaker: Paul
utterance.content: Oh, I couldn’t eat now.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What?! Wait! What are you talking about?! You love their Kung Pao Chicken!

utterance.speaker: Paul
utterance.content: Chicken? Chicken boy!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: My God, I’m sorry! I’m sorry! I didn’t mean to do that! I wouldn’t do that!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Nothin! This is the nine millionth ring store we’ve been too and I can’t find the perfect ring! Ugly ring! Ugly ring! Ugly ring! It’s a beautiful selection.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay, so maybe you don’t get her a ring. Maybe you-maybe you do something different. Y’know? Maybe you get her an engagement bracelet, y’know? Or an engagement tiara? Or—ooh! An engagement Revolutionary War musket! (Picks one up from the display in the corner.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Y’know, I’m so glad I picked you to help me with this.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Huh? Can you just imagine getting down on one knee and handing her this gorgeous piece of weaponry?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah, I’m gonna stick with the ring. Oh, this one’s nice! I like this one! Sir? Uh, kind sir? Can I see this one?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Wait a minute, no, this is, this is the reason you brought me. Okay? I know how to haggle. So let me handle this from here on out.

utterance.speaker: Male Jeweler
utterance.content: Can I help you?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Uh-uh, yes. I would like to see that ring please.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Or not, whatever.

utterance.speaker: Male Jeweler
utterance.content: This ring is from the 1920s, it’s a one and a half carat diamond with sapphires on either side.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Sir, can I ask you to umm, could you…hold out that ring and ask me to marry you?

utterance.speaker: Male Jeweler
utterance.content: Okay. Will you marry me?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh my God that’s it, that’s the ring! How much is it?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Chandler, I-I will handle this! How much is it?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: We will give you $10.

utterance.speaker: Male Jeweler
utterance.content: Are you interested in this ring?!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yes! Yes, but I can only pay $8,000.

utterance.speaker: Male Jeweler
utterance.content: Okay, I can let it go at eight.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: We stand firm at $10.

utterance.speaker: Male Jeweler
utterance.content: How would you like to pay?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Uh, credit card. Oh no! No-no, but I left my credit card with Joey. Okay, I’ll go get it. You guard the ring.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay. Listen, I’m sorry about before. Do you have anything her for $10.

utterance.speaker: Male Jeweler
utterance.content: Uh yes, I have these two rather beautiful $5 bills.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I’ll give you $1 for them.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey, remember how Chandler and Phoebe blew us off yesterday?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Remember? You-you were eating pizza.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay. Well, apparently Chandler’s angry at us for not getting him a ticket to that Knicks game a couple of weeks ago.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh, we’re supposed to just get him a ticket?! That guy is always mooching off of us!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah! Anyway, I-I still think we should try to patch things up, y’know? Like uh, maybe we could get him to get tickets to another Knicks game and invite him.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh wow that’s a great idea! And I still have his credit card.

utterance.speaker: Gunther
utterance.content: Here you go.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey-hey-hey-ho-ho, I got this one. Here you go. Y’know I gotta tell ya, sometimes I just—I don’t get Chandler. Y’know, me and him do stuff all the time without you and you don’t get all upset.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: All the time?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: All the time!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh my God! Oh my God!!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Still crying?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Like a little girl. I know. I know. I know. This is all my fault; I wanted him to open up. But God, I didn’t know that I was gonna unleash this-this weepy, clingy, moist monster!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Y’know, I only know of two surefire ways to shut a man up. And one of them is sex.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What’s the other one?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I don’t know, I’ve never had to use the other one. I’m just saying y’know, if we’re having sex, he’s not gonna be talking.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh that’s right. You’re the talker. Anyway uh, great idea! Umm, I gotta go to the store; I told him that I would buy him some more tissues.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh, we have some…

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No you don’t!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay umm, I’d also like to try on the tiara. Oh yeah. Okay. What do you think, too much?

utterance.speaker: Male Jeweler
utterance.content: A tad.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay. Then, take the tiara back and let me hold the musket again. Something’s missing. It’s not… Okay oh, let me see the ring my friend picked out.

utterance.speaker: Male Jeweler
utterance.content: Where’s the 1920s princess cut ring.

utterance.speaker: Female Jeweler
utterance.content: I just sold it to that gentleman.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh my God!! No! What?! Help me! Let me out! Now!

utterance.speaker: Paul
utterance.content: Rachel?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: No. How are ya Paul?

utterance.speaker: Paul
utterance.content: Okay. Chandler, did your dad ever hug you?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: No, did he hug you?!

utterance.speaker: Paul
utterance.content: No! No! It’s just that, my dad never did. I miss my dad.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well, you can see my dad in Vegas kissing other dads.

utterance.speaker: Paul
utterance.content: Hey Chandler?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah?

utterance.speaker: Paul
utterance.content: Would you…….Would you hug me?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I’m a little busy here Paul.

utterance.speaker: Paul
utterance.content: That’s exactly what my dad used to say!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay, a quick one. Come on hug it out. Oh hey! There you go. Okay.

utterance.speaker: Paul
utterance.content: Five more seconds.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Paul
utterance.content: Joey!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Whoa-whoa-hey-hey! Hi, Paul is it?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Do you have my credit card?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yes, it’s in my… In…in my pocket. My back pocket! My back pocket!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Thank God!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh hey listen I got us tickets to a Knicks game tonight.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh, I can’t go.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Come on! It’ll be fun! Me, you, and Ross, and… Paul probably…

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Chandler, I found the perfect ring.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh, that’s uh, that’s pretty nice but I’m gonna go with the one I picked first.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh my God Chandler, the one you picked is gone. It’s over!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Some guy bought it. I’m sorry. I tired to stop it but they put me in jail!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: They put you in jail?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: The little jail between the doors!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Phoebe, I asked you to guard the ring!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I know, I’m sorry! But y’know, this ring is better! Monica never even saw the other ring.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah but when he proposed to me with the ring I got goose bumps.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Maybe it was the guy.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: It was the ring!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey! So uh, was he excited about the tickets?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No! He blew us off!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What?!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I know!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I can’t believe it. Can I tell you something? I’m a little mad at him now.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Can I tell you something? Me too.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Y’know what? He didn’t want to talk to us about being angry, well maybe we don’t talk to him at all!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Ooooh! Freeze him out.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: That’s right!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I like it!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Eh? We’ll show him!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: From now on, it’s gonna be Joey and Ross, best friends. Okay! We’re gonna be the new Joey and Chandler.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hi. I’m back.

utterance.speaker: Paul
utterance.content: Hey! I have so much more to tell ya, I’ve written it all down!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ah that’s great. No actually that’s… That’s great! That’s really great! Y’know, I gotta tell ya writing, I mean writing, gets me uh, gets me kinda hot.

utterance.speaker: Paul
utterance.content: Wait! Wait! Listen! Listen to this! Y’know what I wanted to be when I was that age?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: A lover?

utterance.speaker: Paul
utterance.content: A surfer.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh yeah surfer?

utterance.speaker: Paul
utterance.content: I wanted to be one with the waves, y’know?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay, hold on real quick, hold on a second let me just uh, get a little more comfortable here. Wait, now wait a second, this isn’t too revealing is it?

utterance.speaker: Paul
utterance.content: No. What ever happened to that little dude. So full of dreams…

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I don’t care about the little dude! I can’t! I cannot listen to anymore of this! Y’know, the only person who would want to listen to this is a mental health professional! And then it’s only because they get paid $100 an hour! Do you know how much money I could’ve made listening to you? $2,000! And do you know when I figured that out? While you were talking!

utterance.speaker: Paul
utterance.content: What?! I can’t believe you’re trying to stifle me! When just 14 hours ago we figured out that that is exactly what my mother was trying to do to me!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh… I’m sorry. I… I-I don’t mean—I didn’t mean to stifle you. I… This is all just a little overwhelming.

utterance.speaker: Paul
utterance.content: Oh Rachel, I’m so sorry. I didn’t mean to overwhelm you. It’s just that, when those gates open, you… Hard to close ‘em. But they are closed now. Believe me.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I’m so glad, I’m so glad you shared. And I’m glad that you’re done. What do you say we umm…

utterance.speaker: Paul
utterance.content: I would really like that.

utterance.speaker: Paul
utterance.content: That was…so good.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I can’t believe I let you talk me into buying this stupid gumball machine looking ring!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: It’s not a stupid gumball machine looking ring! It’s a beautiful ring!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: No, it’s not! When I looked at the other ring I could see Monica’s face when I gave it to her, y’know? And I could see her saying yes. When I look at this ring, all I see is a ring! Unless I look at it really closely and then I can see my own eye. Look, this is the most important thing I’m gonna do in my life. I wanna make sure it’s perfect.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay. There may be a way that we can get the other ring back. ‘Cause I heard the guy tell the jeweler where he was going to propose. So maybe we can get him to trade rings or something.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I can’t do that.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well you certainly can’t give her that stupid gumball ring.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: There he is!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay and he hasn’t proposed yet because she has no ring on her finger.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Wow! You’re good! After this, we should solve crimes.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah! Okay, go, go, go get him.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, okay. Excuse me sir? Could you come with me please? You have a phone call.

utterance.speaker: Customer
utterance.content: Who is it?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: It is your office.

utterance.speaker: Customer
utterance.content: Do you know who at my office?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: John?

utterance.speaker: Customer
utterance.content: Oh John! Great!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Here he is.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hi! Hi. Okay, there was a slight mix-up at the jewelry store, the ring you’re about to propose with was supposed to be held for me. So, I’m gonna need to have that back. But, in exchange I’m willing to trade you this beautiful, more expensive ring. Ew.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Wow! I would trade.

utterance.speaker: Customer
utterance.content: It is beautiful, but I’m gonna use this one. Now, if you’ll excuse me.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: No-no! This is my fiancee and her heart was set on that ring. You don’t want to break her heart now do you?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah, do you want to break a dying woman’s heart?

utterance.speaker: Customer
utterance.content: You’re dying?!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah, she’s dying… Of a cough apparently.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yes, and it is my dying wish to have that ring. See, if I’m not buried with that ring then my spirit is going to wander the nether world for all eternity…

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay, that’s enough honey!

utterance.speaker: Customer
utterance.content: I don’t know. Let me see the ring.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Great! Okay, here.

utterance.speaker: Customer
utterance.content: All right.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Thank you. Thank you. Thank you! And you are about to marry a wonderful man! Hey! I’m marrying a dead woman!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Guys? I’ve got something important to tell ya. Guys? Guys?! I’m gonna ask Monica to marry me.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I think we gotta end the freeze out.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Wait a minute, is this, is this for real?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah, check out the ring.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh my God!!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: So you two are really serious?!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yep, pretty much.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: You-you’re gonna get married?! I mean… We’re gonna be brothers-in-law!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: And-and-and-and-and-and, and we’re gonna be friends again!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Heyyyy—What?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh it’s water under the bridge, forget it!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay! I was gonna wait ‘til uh, it was official y’know? But I got so excited I just had to tell you guys because you’re my best friends.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I think I’m gonna cry!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ugh! No more crying! Please! I just dumped one cry baby, I’ll dump you too!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I’m gonna ask Monica to marry me.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh my God! Oh my God! Oh Chandler!! You guys are gonna be so happy!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I know.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Where’s all the tissues?!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Check out the ring.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Nice! One and a half carat easy.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hi.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey-hey Pheebs!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Chandler’s gonna ask Monica to marry him!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh I know, I helped pick out the ring.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: You told her before you told us?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well, she walked in when I was looking at the ring brochures. You can understand that, right? Guys? Guys?
